title: Names of Wearables When Viewing Another Player's Items
body:
> by 0x3b67727b341b5a12043f8fa13be67897b98e5a2f (Armen)

Players usually notice somebody with cool wearables and would want to peek into their collection. Adding nametags to the wearables could promote searches and traffic to those player-made wearables.

- Yes
- No
- Invalid question/options


**[Vote on this proposal on the Decentraland DAO](https://governance.decentraland.org/proposal/?id=26b59f30-4049-11ec-be0c-afec86cba5e5)**
author: 0x5E23D08324f017d5425e59A2782C9ae27aCE0958
